name: Rally
blurb: Rally is a centralized platform to plan and build trips
description: Plan a trip for yourself or with friends. Create multiple trips, itineraries, split costs, and find popular activites near your travel destination.

name: Oui Circle
blurb: Oui Circle is an online community bulletein
description: Want to host a community event? Need volunteers or donations for the neighborhood community center? Oui Circle provides a place to enrich and provide further betterment of your community, and get to know your neighbors better!

name: Vaccine Finder
blurb: Find a Covid-19 vaccine administrator near you
description: Use Vaccine Finder to find the nearest Covid-19 vaccine administrator near you. Find which vaccines are available and book an appointment.
